amendment.description: An amendment numbered 76 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to reduce funding for the Institute of Education Sciences by $707,372,000, and transfer the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for Institute of Education Sciences by $707,372,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 118 - 316 (Roll no. 657).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 118 - 316 (Roll no. 657).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
